title: All star viewer
body: I can't seem to get the all star viewer 2018 icon even though I've disabled adblock, watched live, watched couple of vods for 10+ minutes, and made sure to connect my account to rewards. Is there anything else that i'm missing or is it a bug?

replies.body:
yea only first 2 counted, one on first mision 
im at 1/12 and watched around 10 and only the first counted, doesnt matter if i restarted {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
it sucky rn. rn im at 10/12, and for some reason the counter only goes up every time i increase it by 1 then restart the client.
it's counted two for me. If we combine we can complete it!
Same. Mission is buggy as heck.
